text:
the only reason i can think of that makes this feel like a "mario 64 ripoff" is that they are both platform games. the main goal is pretty much the same in both games, collect stars/jiggy's in each level to advance to the next level  to beat a boss to save a kidnapped person.

al in al banjo-kazooie, mario 64 and concker's bad fur day are great games.
